Sentencas: In strontium- and magnesium-doped LaGaO3 (LSGM) electrolyte-based solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC), lanthanum-doped CeO2 (LDC) is usually used as buffer layer material to prevent reactions between LSGM electrolyte and NiO-based anode.
Titulo: Phase formation between La(Sr)Ga(Mg)O3 and Ce(La)O2 for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: In literature, based on results for one particular LSGM composition, a fixed buffer layer composition of 40% La-doped ceria (LDC40) has been used even with electrolytes of different LSGM compositions.
Titulo: Phase formation between La(Sr)Ga(Mg)O3 and Ce(La)O2 for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: In this study, we report the results of a comprehensive study of phase formations between various LSGM and LDC compositions.
Titulo: Phase formation between La(Sr)Ga(Mg)O3 and Ce(La)O2 for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Our results show that only one LSGM/LDC combination results in no additional phases.
Titulo: Phase formation between La(Sr)Ga(Mg)O3 and Ce(La)O2 for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: For the other combinations, at least one and often two additional phases, LaSrGaO4 and LaSrGa3O7, result.
Titulo: Phase formation between La(Sr)Ga(Mg)O3 and Ce(La)O2 for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Because LaSrGa3O7 has much lower conductivity, it is necessary to select combinations that avoid this phase.
Titulo: Phase formation between La(Sr)Ga(Mg)O3 and Ce(La)O2 for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: We propose that the combination that results in no additional phase should be considered favorably for SOFCs.
Titulo: Phase formation between La(Sr)Ga(Mg)O3 and Ce(La)O2 for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: For other LSGM compositions, LDC50 should be used as a buffer layer instead of LDC40 as is presently done in SOFC studies.
Titulo: Phase formation between La(Sr)Ga(Mg)O3 and Ce(La)O2 for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Alternately, if LDC40 is preferred for buffer layer, then lower Sr content LSGM compositions should be used as electrolytes.
Titulo: Phase formation between La(Sr)Ga(Mg)O3 and Ce(La)O2 for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: These combinations are likely to lead to better long-term SOFC performance.
Titulo: Phase formation between La(Sr)Ga(Mg)O3 and Ce(La)O2 for solid oxide fuel cell applications
